org.orgName: Vancouver Island Supreme Court of Civil Justice, British Columbia

div1.p: Vancouver Island - Supreme Court. Minutes Oct. 15, 1858 - July 23, 1863. Original. Entries to Sept. 15, 1859 duplicated
In the Supreme Court of Civil Justice
Before Honble David Cameron Chief Justice In Chambers Wednesday the twenty sixth day of September A.D. 1860.
Regina vs. Flemming In Re "Charles" a Slave

Upon reading the return to the Writ of Habeas Corpus signed in this matter and on hearing of Charles and the said defendant in person and it appearing to me that the said Charles has been surrendered by the said defendant and is now in the custody of the Sheriff and where being no Charge warrant in commitment alleged against him. I do order that the said Sheriff do discharge the said Charles from his said custody forthwith
